DOC.brief_title: Envarsus XR African American Renal Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: 1 . African American race 2 . Adult renal transplant recipient ( > 18 y/o ) 3 . Previous adverse reaction contraindication use tacrolimus 1 . Non African American race 2 . Less 18 y/o ( pediatric patient ) 3 . Recipients liver small bowel transplant 4 . Adverse reaction tacrolimus
